summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 (NA) FORD SUPER DUTY. ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS, WHILE DRIVING, THE CONTACT WAS UNABLE TO SEE THE INSTRUMENT PANEL DURING THE DAYLIGHT. THE CONTACT MENTIONED THAT THE INSTRUMENT PANEL LOOKED POLAROID DURING THE DAYLIGHT. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED AND THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. FORD MOTOR COMPANY WAS CONTACTED AT 800-444-3311 AND ADVISED THE CONTACT TO CALL THE RECALL HOTLINE AT 866-436-7332. THE CONTACT CALLED THE HOTLINE AND WAS INFORMED THAT NO RECALL WAS ASSOCIATED WITH THE VEHICLE AND TO CONTACT NHTSA. THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 3,428. UPDATED 08/18/17*LJ    *CN
